text:
Starlight Amusement Park (Bronx): The south end of the park showing the swimming pool and reservoir, seen from the E. 174th Street bridge over the Bronx River. The entrance to the park is on the south side of E. 177th Street, at Devoe Avenue.

July 18, 1928
Views 1, 2

P. L. Sperr

(3)

The same, years later.

July 23, 1940.
title: Bronx: Starlight Amusement Park.
